emuInput.TitMainTitle: Alberta Thompson wearing paisley dress, posed with baby Lynn Evans on her first birthday, in domestic interior with diamond patterned sofa, brick fireplace, and daffodils print on wall
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 7, 1959, pg. A20, reads: "FIRST BIRTHDAY - Little Lynn Evans, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Evans, celebrated her first birthday, Feb. 2, with the help of her god-mother, Miss Alberta Thompson, shown with her. - Harris Photo."
